Html: How can I make my child pages fit the parent window, rather than being of a fixed size? Especially if I have resized my MainWindow?
How is this not answered? I am having the same problems. My child pages are not filling up the parent window, and it's super annoying.
A panel such as a Grid in a child page does size automatically, unless you set an explicit width/height. Could you otherwise post a XAML snippet?

Con respecto a este problema, vemos que el codigo XAML, las propiedades d:DesignHeight y d:DesignWidth se encargan de redimensionar autom√°ticamente el frame.

Nota:
  Verifica que en tu codigo XAML tienes estas propiedades d:DesignHeight y  d:DesignWidth, en lugar de Height y  Width.
Espero les ayude.
